pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation, Simulation and Reliability of Drifting Markov Models // Performs the drifting Markov models (DMM) which are non- homogeneous Markov models designed for modeling the heterogeneities of sequences in a more flexible way than homogeneous Markov chains or even hidden Markov models. In this context, we developed an R package dedicated to the estimation, simulation and the exact computation of associated reliability of drifting Markov models. The implemented methods are described in Vergne, N. (2008), doi:10.2202/1544-6115.1326 and Barbu, V.S., Vergne, N. (2019) doi:10.1007/s11009-018-9682-8 .
